disconnected.title: Connect Doppler with your PrestaShop store
disconnected.subtitle: Synchronize the Contacts from your store and all your data with Doppler to send personalized Campaigns based on that information. Any doubts? Just press
disconnected.subtitle2: To perform this integration, you must first set up some configurations in your PrestaShop account.
disconnected.store_placeholder: Put the URL of your PrestaShop store
disconnected.list_select_subtitle: Select the Doppler List in which you want to add your PrestaShop Contacts.

errors.cannot_connect: Oops! We could not connect with PrestaShop please try again later.
errors.no_permissions: Oops! You have no permissions to access products, clients or carts in PrestaShop.
errors.no_sync_list: Oops! We could not synchronize your contacts in the selected List. Please try later.
errors.unauthorized: Oops! Verify your Store Url and App Key.

connected.selected_list_subtitle: At this moment you have 1 List. Keep in mind that you can manually synchronize it any time you want.

disconnect_popup.title: Are you sure you want to disconnect this integration?
disconnect_popup.description: If you disconnect, your List will no longer receive new Subscribers from your PrestaShop account and the Automations associated with the integration will be paused. Anyhow, you won't lose the contacts synced up to this moment.
